ExampleDefinition.Title: Pan on Mouse-Drag
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates mouse-dragging of SciChart: Overlays three series on a SciChartSurface and applies the ZoomPanModifier. This is a built-in ChartModifierBase derived class which adds the behavior of panning on mouse-drag.
